name: eBIZ.mobility
overview:
eBIZ.mobility provides the online payment processing service called OneTouch Online Purchasing™ that enables trusted service providers including telecom operators, banks , ISP’s and others, to profit from the open web through their existing infrastructure.

This application offers consumers an easy, fast and secure payment option to download digital content to their PCs or mobile handsets from anywhere on the web, and charge it directly to an existing account with the trusted service provider of their choice. Simply put, OneTouch allows anyone from anywhere in the world to make purchases without the need of a credit card, or even a PayPal account.

eBIZ.mobility’s innovative solution enables service providers to profit from the web by becoming a “PayPal” for their subscribers- postpaid or prepaid.

With the proliferation of mobile devices and the potential of anytime-anywhere commerce, there has been a steady rise in interest among retailers, banks, vendors, payment networks and mobile network operators in participating in the digital content payment market. But there has been no interoperator standard for handling online digital content transactions in a secure and cost effective manner for computers and mobile phones.

Mobile Network Operator content revenue is at risk as walled gardens crumble due to customer demand for “open internet” browsing, and a regulatory pressure for net neutrality. Also the The exploding market for online content is underserved by credit cards due to consumer fears of fraud, credit challenges of the youth market and high fees for micro-payments. eBIZ.mobility enables Telecom Service Providers to monetize their existing billing & payment infrastructure for the open internet with minimum investment, deploying quickly as an IMS application or with any content charging API. Thus helping them to profit from the web.

Advantages: 1.eBIZ.mobility matches demand on the internet with the need to generate revenue & monetize billing systems to those that otherwise would become low margin bit pipes. 2.eBIZ.mobility’s OneTouch Online Purchasing™ interfaces to existing VAS and or billing systems to benefit trusted service providers, online merchants and consumers. 3.OneTouch Online Purchasing™ enables micropayment processing for all open web content including user generated content, social networking websites and other hyper growth sources. 4.There are no country restrictions, barriers or borders to apply or use this application.
